Name: minimize_unachieved_sprint_goals
Description: Favor sprints that achieve their goals

Name: maximize_certified_skill_coverage
Description: Prefer certified skills for critical tasks

Name: minimize_low_experience_scrum_master_use
Description: Discourage assigning very low experience Scrum Masters

Name: maximize_ready_user_stories
Description: Prefer user stories with acceptable status

Name: minimize_blocked_tasks
Description: Reduce count of tasks currently blocked

Name: maximize_high_benefit_sprint_goals
Description: Prefer sprint goals with higher stated benefit

Name: minimize_outdated_backlog
Description: Prefer product backlogs with recent last_updated

Name: maximize_tested_snapshots
Description: Favor snapshots with successful test status

Name: minimize_unresolved_blockers_age
Description: Prefer blockers with resolved_on set or recent detected_on
